entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
